module.name: fpcormdbobjects
module.short: This unit contains the super types, derived into the classes that are generated by the fpcORM.
module.descr:
The interfaces and objects in this unit, are types used to express database table and field objects abstractly. When derived from, they should provide the means of bridging between the free pascal primitive datatypes and the database datatypes.
It may prove nessecary to implement some knowledge of different database platforms here later.
